subject: Guidelines for procurement of collection agencies through Competitive Bidding System
text: HTdft <cflv <TTHTf wfaqro TT9 /Phone: 91-11-25074100/25074200 (e6 @da7t & 7ynrf 471q4) 57H / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India QF: IExtn:: 2223 2318 2488 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 0i-5 & 6, #rer-10, ETGT, # fqwi- 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 CIRCULAR NQ: NHALLCOMMERCIAL OPERATONS_ 120 Sub:: Guidelines for procurement of collection agencies through Competitive Bidding System: This circular is issued in supercession of earlier Cir. 109 dated 21.10.2009 & cir, 115 dated 22.12.2009_ As per present policy of NHAI, the user fee collection on all the section of National Highways, except BOT projects, were being under taken through Ex-servicemen Agencies sponsored by Director General of Resettlement only till the implementation of OMT concept: Now the Chairman NHAI has   been    designated by the authority as the Competent Authority to decide the mode of   departmental collection in case the performance of the selected mode is not satisfactory Or there is no response to a particular mode: The modes recognized as of now for user fee collection on Public Funded Projects & BOT Annuity Projects are:- (a) By Private Contractor calling competitive bids. {6} By engaging DGR Sponsored Agency. On OMT Concept basis. The procedure of engaging the agency through DGR is modified vide ur circular 119 dated 24.05.2010. In order to enter into a contract with Private Contractor through open bid system, a draft bid document is enclosed. The blanks in the draft document shall be filled in by the PD, approved by CGM- RO and be sent to HQ for inviting bids. Procedure_for_procurement of Private Contractor for_User _Fee Collection: (i) The process of procurement of user fee collection agency by calling open competitive bids is to be started with immediate effect; (ii) The bids, as provided in the draft bid document, will be invited at HQ level: (iii) The Annual Potential Collection [PC] for & particular plaza would be fixed at HQ level. The following details in this regard shali be provided by the PD duly approved by the CGM-RO. A. Actual annual collection during last 12 months or the actual period of collection which ever is less  preceding three months of invitation of Bid; B.
